name: com.kjub.datapeeker
description: Data Peeker is an advanced Unity Editor tool designed to enhance your workflow by providing a detailed, searchable view of your game's data models. It allows developers to dynamically inspect and interact with object hierarchies, offering insights into complex data structures through a user-friendly interface. Perfect for debugging and refining game mechanics, this tool streamlines the process of working with serialized data, lists, and dictionaries in real-time.
